subject: Belmont Stakes
Television
Ratings and Rating Systems
lead_paragraph: Saturday’s Belmont Stakes on ABC generated a 3.1 preliminary overnight rating, plunging 38 percent from the 5.0 last year for Summer Bird’s victory.
snippet: Saturday’s Belmont Stakes on ABC generated a 3.1 preliminary overnight rating, plunging 38 percent from the 5.0 last year for Summer Bird’s victory.
